title: The Magic of Migration
description: The Magic of Migration discusses some of the many creatures that migrate. The book explains how, when, where, and why migration takes place. Photos, maps, and a diagram support the text.
highFrequencyWords: drought, magnetic, migration, navigate, spawn, wildebeests
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Bold Print                : Recognize and understand the use of bold print
awareness: Suffixes : Identify the suffix -ion in text
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
